channel.title: Analytics on BiggeR-tRee
channel.description: Recent content in Analytics on BiggeR-tRee

item.title: Synthetic Data
item.description: There is an increasing need to collaborate between government agencies in developing models to look for better ways to provide the services their citizens need. Often this involves working with a lot of privacy sensitive data. And therefore there are a lot of (legal) issues in sharing these data sets and subsequently the models. I have been looking for ways to generate synthetic data sets with the same properties and structure as the real data sets but without the real rows of data.
